document.heading: Office of Administrative Hearings Independence Preservation Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-177, the “Office of Administrative Hearings Independence Preservation Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-571, which was referred to the Committee on the Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 6, 2004, and May 4, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 21, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-427 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-177 became effective on September 8, 2004.
